Override Styles

Basic Understanding

The Minima theme gem contains these files:


 ├── LICENSE.txt
 ├── README.md
 ├── _includes
 │   ├── disqus_comments.html
 │   ├── footer.html
 │   ├── google-analytics.html
 │   ├── head.html
 │   ├── header.html
 │   ├── icon-github.html
 │   ├── icon-github.svg
 │   ├── icon-twitter.html
 │   └── icon-twitter.svg
 ├── _layouts
 │   ├── default.html
 │   ├── home.html
 │   ├── page.html
 │   └── post.html
 ├── _sass
 │   ├── minima
 │   │   ├── _base.scss
 │   │   ├── _layout.scss
 │   │   └── _syntax-highlighting.scss
 │   └── minima.scss
 └── assets
     └── main.scss

Override the styles inside _sass folder by follow the steps below

Steps to override theme:

  • At your directory root, create a folder _sass.
  • Copy minima.scss from the gem github page and create a minima folder inside _sass folder
  • Create your stylesheet under minima folder
  • At the bottom of minima.scss, you will see @import statement. Add "minima/<your new css file name>.
